# Iteration 03 — Obstacles (Movement Only)

## Goal

Introduce **one moving obstacle** inside the game area.

At the end of this iteration:
- One obstacle exists
- It moves automatically
- Player can still move
- No collisions yet
- No win/lose logic

This iteration is about **independent movement**, not interaction.

---

## Files Allowed to Touch

- js/obstacles.js (new)
- js/main.js (only to import obstacles.js)

❌ No HTML changes  
❌ No CSS changes (unless positioning is broken)  
❌ No collision logic  
❌ No score logic

---

## Required DOM Elements

```txt
.obstacle
#game-area
